AddApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption.name: AddApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption
AddApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption.description: Grants permission to add cloudwatch logging option to the application

AddApplicationInput.name: AddApplicationInput
AddApplicationInput.description: Grants permission to add input to the application

AddApplicationInputProcessingConfigurati.name: AddApplicationInputProcessingConfiguration
AddApplicationInputProcessingConfigurati.description: Grants permission to add input processing configuration to the application

AddApplicationOutput.name: AddApplicationOutput
AddApplicationOutput.description: Grants permission to add output to the application

AddApplicationReferenceDataSource.name: AddApplicationReferenceDataSource
AddApplicationReferenceDataSource.description: Grants permission to add reference data source to the application

AddApplicationVpcConfiguration.name: AddApplicationVpcConfiguration
AddApplicationVpcConfiguration.description: Grants permission to add VPC configuration to the application

CreateApplication.name: CreateApplication
CreateApplication.description: Grants permission to create an application

CreateApplicationPresignedUrl.name: CreateApplicationPresignedUrl
CreateApplicationPresignedUrl.description: Grants permission to create and return a URL that you can use to connect to an application's extension

CreateApplicationSnapshot.name: CreateApplicationSnapshot
CreateApplicationSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot for an application

DeleteApplication.name: DeleteApplication
DeleteApplication.description: Grants permission to delete the application

DeleteApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption.name: DeleteApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption
DeleteApplicationCloudWatchLoggingOption.description: Grants permission to delete the specified cloudwatch logging option of the application

DeleteApplicationInputProcessingConfigur.name: DeleteApplicationInputProcessingConfiguration
DeleteApplicationInputProcessingConfigur.description: Grants permission to delete the specified input processing configuration of the application

DeleteApplicationOutput.name: DeleteApplicationOutput
DeleteApplicationOutput.description: Grants permission to delete the specified output of the application

DeleteApplicationReferenceDataSource.name: DeleteApplicationReferenceDataSource
DeleteApplicationReferenceDataSource.description: Grants permission to delete the specified reference data source of the application

DeleteApplicationSnapshot.name: DeleteApplicationSnapshot
DeleteApplicationSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot for an application

DeleteApplicationVpcConfiguration.name: DeleteApplicationVpcConfiguration
DeleteApplicationVpcConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the specified VPC configuration of the application

DescribeApplication.name: DescribeApplication
DescribeApplication.description: Grants permission to describe the specified application

DescribeApplicationOperation.name: DescribeApplicationOperation
DescribeApplicationOperation.description: Grants permission to describe an application operation of an application

DescribeApplicationSnapshot.name: DescribeApplicationSnapshot
DescribeApplicationSnapshot.description: Grants permission to describe an application snapshot

DescribeApplicationVersion.name: DescribeApplicationVersion
DescribeApplicationVersion.description: Grants permission to describe the application version of an application

DiscoverInputSchema.name: DiscoverInputSchema
DiscoverInputSchema.description: Grants permission to discover the input schema for the application

ListApplicationOperations.name: ListApplicationOperations
ListApplicationOperations.description: Grants permission to list application operations of an application

ListApplicationSnapshots.name: ListApplicationSnapshots
ListApplicationSnapshots.description: Grants permission to list the snapshots for an application

ListApplicationVersions.name: ListApplicationVersions
ListApplicationVersions.description: Grants permission to list application versions of an application

ListApplications.name: ListApplications
ListApplications.description: Grants permission to list applications for the account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to fetch the tags associated with the application

RollbackApplication.name: RollbackApplication
RollbackApplication.description: Grants permission to perform rollback operation on an application

StartApplication.name: StartApplication
StartApplication.description: Grants permission to start the application

StopApplication.name: StopApplication
StopApplication.description: Grants permission to stop the application

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to the application

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the application

UpdateApplication.name: UpdateApplication
UpdateApplication.description: Grants permission to update the application

UpdateApplicationMaintenanceConfiguratio.name: UpdateApplicationMaintenanceConfiguration
UpdateApplicationMaintenanceConfiguratio.description: Grants permission to update the maintenance configuration of an application

GetApplicationState.name: GetApplicationState
GetApplicationState.description: Grants permission to Kinesis Data Analytics console to display stream results for Kinesis Data Analytics SQL runtime applications
